mapper.update: UPDATE manager_notice SET manager_id=#{managerId}, manager_notice_title=#{managerNoticeTitle}, manager_notice_content=#{managerNoticeContent}, category=#{category}, update_date=NOW() WHERE manager_notice_no = #{managerNoticeNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO manager_notice(manager_id, manager_notice_title, manager_notice_content, category,create_date, update_date) VALUE(#{managerId}, #{managerNoticeTitle}, #{managerNoticeContent}, #{category}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT manager_notice_no managerNoticeNo ,manager_id managerId ,manager_notice_title managerNoticeTitle ,manager_notice_content managerNoticeContent ,category ,create_date createDate ,update_date updateDate FROM manager_notice WHERE manager_notice_no=${managerNoticeNo}

SELECT manager_notice_no managerNoticeNo ,manager_id managerId ,manager_notice_title managerNoticeTitle ,category ,create_date createDate FROM manager_notice WHERE category = #{category} ORDER BY create_date DESC LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
